attributes.action: lend fundings to bring back woolworths
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we would like the government to lend the fundings to Mr Tony Page to return woolworths to our high streets.
as he still believes he can bring woolworths if he can get the fundings.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
